00091 template <class Base>
00092 void TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::AddChildContainer(IMessageContainer* childContainerPtr)

00102 template <class Base>
00103 bool TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00104 {
00105        if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00106               return false;
00107        }
00108 
00109        bool retVal = true;
00110 
00111        int messageCount = int(m_messages.size());
00112 
00113        static iser::CArchiveTag messagesTag("Messages", "List of messages");
00114        static iser::CArchiveTag messageTag("Message", "Message");
00115 
00116        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(messagesTag, messageTag, messageCount);
00117 
00118        if (!retVal){
00119               return false;
00120        }
00121 
00122        for (         MessageList::const_iterator iter = m_messages.begin();
00123                             iter != m_messages.end();
00124                             ++iter){
00125               const IMessageConsumer::MessagePtr& messagePtr = *iter;
00126 
00127               iser::ISerializable* serMessagePtr = const_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(dynamic_cast<const iser::ISerializable*>(messagePtr.GetPtr()));
00128 
00129               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(messageTag);
00130               retVal = retVal && serMessagePtr->Serialize(archive);
00131               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(messageTag);
00132        }
00133 
00134        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(messagesTag);
00135 
00136        return retVal;
00137 }

00158 template <class Base>
00159 int TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::GetWorstCategory() const
00160 {
00161        int worstCategory = m_worstCategory;
00162        int childCount = GetChildsCount();
00163 
00164        if (worstCategory < 0){
00165               worstCategory = 0;
00166 
00167               for (         MessageList::const_iterator iter = m_messages.begin();
00168                                    iter != m_messages.end();
00169                                    ++iter){
00170                      const IMessageContainer::MessagePtr& messagePtr = *iter;
00171 
00172                      int category = messagePtr->GetInformationCategory();
00173                      if (category > worstCategory){
00174                             worstCategory = category;
00175                      }
00176               }
00177        }
00178 
00179        for (int childIndex = 0; childIndex < childCount; childIndex++){
00180               IMessageContainer* childPtr = dynamic_cast<IMessageContainer*>(GetChild(childIndex));
00181               if (childPtr != NULL){
00182                      int category = childPtr->GetWorstCategory();
00183                      if (category > worstCategory){
00184                             worstCategory = category;
00185                      }
00186               }
00187        }
00188 
00189        return worstCategory;
00190 }

00192 
00193 template <class Base>
00194 IMessageContainer::Messages TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::GetMessages() const
00195 {
00196        IMessageContainer::Messages messages;
00197 
00198        for (         MessageList::const_iterator iter = m_messages.begin();
00199                             iter != m_messages.end();
00200                             ++iter){
00201               const IMessageContainer::MessagePtr& messagePtr = *iter;
00202 
00203               messages.push_back(messagePtr);
00204        }
00205 
00206        int childsCount = GetChildsCount();
00207        for (int childIndex = 0; childIndex < childsCount; childIndex++){
00208               IMessageContainer* childPtr = GetChild(childIndex);
00209               I_ASSERT(childPtr != NULL);
00210 
00211               IMessageContainer::Messages childMessages = childPtr->GetMessages();
00212 
00213               messages += childMessages;
00214        }
00215 
00216        return messages;
00217 }

00230 template <class Base>
00231 void TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::AddMessage(const IMessageConsumer::MessagePtr& messagePtr)
00232 {
00233        I_ASSERT(messagePtr.IsValid());
00234 
00235        if (m_maxMessageCount == 0){
00236               return;
00237        }
00238 
00239        {
00240               istd::TChangeNotifier<IMessageContainer> changePtr(
00241                                    this,
00242                                    IMessageContainer::CF_MESSAGE_ADDED,
00243                                    const_cast<istd::IInformationProvider*>(messagePtr.GetPtr()));
00244 
00245               m_messages.push_back(messagePtr);
00246 
00247               int messageCategory = messagePtr->GetInformationCategory();
00248               if ((m_worstCategory >= 0) && (messageCategory > m_worstCategory)){
00249                      m_worstCategory = messageCategory;
00250               }
00251        }
00252 
00253        if (m_maxMessageCount >= 0){
00254               while (int(m_messages.size()) > m_maxMessageCount){
00255                      I_ASSERT(!m_messages.isEmpty());
00256                      const IMessageContainer::MessagePtr& messageToRemovePtr = m_messages.back();
00257 
00258                      istd::TChangeNotifier<IMessageContainer> changePtr(
00259                                           this,
00260                                           IMessageContainer::CF_MESSAGE_REMOVED,
00261                                           const_cast<istd::IInformationProvider*>(messageToRemovePtr.GetPtr()));
00262 
00263                      int removeCategory = messageToRemovePtr->GetInformationCategory();
00264                      if (removeCategory >= m_worstCategory){
00265                             m_worstCategory = -1;
00266                      }
00267 
00268                      m_messages.pop_back();
00269               }
00270        }
00271 
00272 }
00273

00275 template <class Base>
00276 void TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::ClearMessages()
00277 {
00278        istd::TChangeNotifier<IMessageContainer> changePtr(this, IMessageContainer::CF_RESET);
00279        
00280        m_messages.clear();
00281 
00282        m_worstCategory = 0;
00283 }

00288 template <class Base>
00289 int TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::GetChildsCount() const
00290 {
00291        return int(m_childContainers.size());
00292 }

00294 
00295 template <class Base>
00296 IMessageContainer* TMessageContainerWrap<Base>::GetChild(int index) const
00297 {
00298        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00299        I_ASSERT(index < int(m_childContainers.size()));
00300 
00301        return m_childContainers.at(index);
00302 }
